Episodes.Title: Playing Tight
Episodes.Plot: The Strike team's attempt to play by the book comes to an abrupt end when they discover that two gangs, the Byz Latz and the One-Niners are attempting to alter the balance of power by acquring MP5s.  Claudette and Dutch investigate the murders and feet decapitation of 4 Armenian men by the Armenian mob in their search for the stolen cash from the money train.  Meanwhile, Danny who is doing temp work at a high school while waiting for an appeal, discovers she might me be able to get her old job b
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Brian J. White, David Raibon, Chris Williams, Michele Hicks, Sticky Fingaz, Vincent Angell

Episodes.Title: Blood and Water
Episodes.Plot: Tension within the group begins to mount as the Strike Team attempt to rectify a mistake Vic made when he decided to use some of the cash from the stolen money train during a botched gun-running sting.  Meanwhile, Dutch and Claudette seek the help of a college honor student named Esteban who was the only survivor in the murder of two latin gang members, one of them being his close friend.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Ron Canada, Brian J. White, Jeremy Ray Valdez, Michele Hicks, Sticky Fingaz, Guillermo Diaz

Episodes.Title: Bottom Bitch
Episodes.Plot: A prostitute seeks the help of the police in her quest to bring down her pimp.  Claudette assigns Vic against his wishes to the case, which puts him on the verge of going over the edge.  Dutch uncovers a disturbing trend of rapes and a politician is arrested for solicitation.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Brian J. White, Michele Hicks, Brent Sexton, Mageina Tovah, Efrain Figueroa, Nicki Micheaux, Gareth Williams, Jeanette Miller

Episodes.Title: Streaks and Tips
Episodes.Plot: The newly arrived Decoy Squad and the Strike Team go head to head in the investigation to solve a car-jacking case.  Dutch gets in over his head on an attempted murder case.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Brian J. White, Michele Hicks, Nicki Micheaux, Monnae Michaell, Kimberly McCullough, Gareth Williams, Robbin Ryan, Vincent Angell, Tangie Ambrose

Episodes.Title: Mum
Episodes.Plot: Vic struggles with Claudette's new supervision of the Strike Team.  Marked bills lead Aceveda and a federal agent closer to the truth about the Armenian money-train heist in an episode with a recurring motif of people not reporting crimes against them.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Michele Hicks, Lyne Odums, Peggy Miley, Kurt Caceres, Afemo Omilami, Vincent Angell, Andrew Borba

Episodes.Title: Posse Up
Episodes.Plot: When the ex-wife and child of Julien's former partner, Tommy, are murdered, Tommy becomes a suspect, prompting Julien to team up with Mackey to conduct their own investigation. Elsewhere, Shane goes undercover to catch a group attacking gay prostitutes, and Claudette and Dutch investigate a rape case against Aceveda's orders.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Nicki Micheaux, J.C. MacKenzie, Tommy Hinkley, Camillia Sanes, Mia Wesley, Vincent Angell

Episodes.Title: Safe
Episodes.Plot: Vic and the Strike Team decide to take risky measures to protect themselves from being linked to the Money Train heist. Unfortunately, their plan is interrupted when one of Vic's open cases is suddenly linked to a Narco Corrido song.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Natalie Zea, David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Michele Hicks, Luis Robledo, Gareth Williams, Nicki Micheaux

Episodes.Title: Cracking Ice
Episodes.Plot: An oversight puts Waylon and Trish in serious danger during an undercover job and Claudette is to blame.  Meanwhile, Tommy makes a drastic decision when he realizes nobody in the Barn can help him get back on the job.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Natalie Zea, David Rees Snell, Michele Hicks, Paula Jai Parker, Khary Payton, Gareth Williams, RonReaco Lee, Nicki Micheaux, Matt Gerald

Episodes.Title: Slipknot
Episodes.Plot: When two high profile murders are linked to each other, Aceveda orders Wyms to get the entire Barn involved before gang and racial violence breaks out.  Mackey uses the case to leverage himself and the Strike Team back into the streets of Farmington.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Michele Hicks, Noel Gugliemi, Nicki Micheaux, Rashaan Nall, Paul Benjamin, Vincent Angell, Camillia Sanes, Gareth Williams, William Stanford Davis, Dwayne L. Barnes, Andrew B

Episodes.Title: What Power is...
Episodes.Plot: Aceveda finds himself in a near fatal confrontation, and enlists Vic to help him take down the suspects in order to help service his own personal agenda.  Meanwhile after losing her position of power, Claudette rejoins Dutch on the search for the cuddler rapist as they get a stunning break in the case.
Episodes.GuestStars: Clark Gregg, David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Michele Hicks, DeLane Matthews, Monnae Michaell, Rebecca Pidgeon, Camillia Sanes, Larry Sullivan, Rif Hutton, Kurt Caceres, Wilmer Calderon

Episodes.Title: Strays
Episodes.Plot: During a routine bust on bangers, Vic and the Team discover a money laundering ring that reaches far and wide in the crime community.  Meanwhile, Dutch takes the chilling confession of the man who was arrested in the serial-rape case, and Danny goes undercover.
Episodes.GuestStars: Clark Gregg, Natalie Zea, David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Michele Hicks, Lionel Mark Smith, Vicellous Reon Shannon, Rebecca Pidgeon, DeLane Matthews, Dominic Hoffman

Episodes.Title: Riceburner
Episodes.Plot: When Aceveda assigns The Strike Team to serve a high risk warrant against a mob killer to service his political agenda, they find themselves embroiled in a hostile struggle with the Korean community.  Now the Team must find out how to put an end to the situation before they end up casualties of a racial fued.  Meanwhile, one of Vic's informants works with Danny on finding stolen chairs, while having eyes for her.
Episodes.GuestStars: Daniel Dae Kim, Natalie Zea, David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Douglas Roberts, Lydia Look, RonReaco Lee, Rif Hutton, Andrew Borba

Episodes.Title: Fire in the Hole
Episodes.Plot: When a mole in the treasury department is discovered and the framed suspect in the Armenian money train robbery turns up missing, the Strike team race to find the suspect before their cover is blown.  Meanwhile, Claudette attempts to make amends with the Decoy Squad by going undercover to help them on a case.
Episodes.GuestStars: Natalie Zea, David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Brian J. White, RonReaco Lee, Mo, Michael Phenicie, Nicki Micheaux, Gareth Williams, Andrew Borba

Episodes.Title: All In
Episodes.Plot: With an Armenian hit-man hot on their trail, the Strike team sweeps the streets of the Armenian community to find him before he finds them.  After catching a break, Aceveda's suspicions grow about the Strike Team's involvement with the Money Train robbery.  Meanwhile, Dutch and Claudette investigate a case that could repeal hundreds of convictions, which leaves Claudette having to choose between her conscience and her career.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Brian J. White, Michele Hicks, Stana Katic, Karmin Murcelo, Dominic Hoffman, Marcos De La Cruz, Anthony Azizi, Andrew Borba

Episodes.Title: On Tilt
Episodes.Plot: When Aceveda confirms that the Strike Team is the target of an Armenian mob hit, Mackey must take matters into his own hands.  Meanwhile, Whym's career is on the line when she disobeys Aceveda's orders to put a case to rest that may prove the innocence of convicted felons.
Episodes.GuestStars: Andre 3000, David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Michael Tomlinson, Stana Katic, Yasmine Delawari, Michael Benyaer
